the brief version of it is manifests essentially describe constraints and manifest only describe constraints on
your direct dependencies whereas locks are a transitively complete picture of the entire dependency graph and there
aren't constraints in there there are specific revisions ideally immutable revisions but so GPS is built around the
idea that the implementing tool passes in an implementation of called like an analyz and it really only has one method
